title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1931/93 of 16 July 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1234/93 fixing for the 1993 marketing year the reference price for cherries
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1931/93 of 16 July 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1234/93 fixing for the 1993 marketing year the reference price for cherries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 1234/93, 'CN code 0809 20' is hereby replaced by 'CN codes 0809 20 40 and 0809 20 80'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply for the 1993 marketing year.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 July 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 69, 20. 3. 1993, p. 7.
(3) OJ No L 124, 20. 5. 1993, p. 32.
